features: Fresh inspiration: With modern materials, colors and patterns, this contemporary interpretation pays homage to the all-around performance of the XA Pro 3D trail running shoe
Enhanced stability: The 3D Advanced Chassis delivers a consistent ride for maximum stability even in the most rugged terrain. It's all about confidence
Extra grip: More than just innovative technology, full premium wet traction grip means you stay on track whatever the weather

3D Advanced Chassis™: Placed between the outsole and midsole, this low-profile chassis helps optimize motion control and energy management. It also provides extra protection for a precise, stable and responsive ride

Contagrip® MA: Contagrip® MA is built for the widest variety of surfaces. It balances both the geometry and the rubber compound to deliver confidence on wet, dry, hard or loose surfaces, and offer long-term durability
